name: Firework Artisan Kagi
bond: Firework Artisan Kagi > Firework Artisan Tama
Increases Firework Artisan Tama's skill DMG by 10%
Firework Artisan Tama > Firework Artisan Kagi
Increases Firework Artisan Kagi's skill DMG by 10%

additional_data.description: One of the two master firework artisans that captured the imaginations of the people in Edo-era Japan. Inheriting the knowledge of artisans throughout the ages, Kagi was an innovator who created new and exciting rockets to compete with rival and close friend, Tama. The spirit world firework festival was said to have been started by the pair after their competition to make ever more beautiful displays resulted in the creation of fireworks they couldn't launch with their spirit essence alone.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ "The Great Fireworks Showdown" Event: Defeat Lv. 40, 50, 120, 160 Avatar Shiranui.
◦ "The Great Fireworks Showdown" Event: Random drops after LVL 40.
◦ "The Great Fireworks Showdown" Get a First Half Ranking of 1000 and above.
◦ "The Great Fireworks Showdown" Get a First Half Ranking of 2501~6000.
◦ "The Great Fireworks Showdown" Get a Total Ranking of 7500 and above.
additional_data.notes_and_trivia: ◦ Slightly increases total Event Points gained during the "The Great Fireworks Showdown" event.

main: "In the fleeting moment lies true beauty."
skill: "I bet you've never seen a firework like this before!"
summon: "Are you interested in learning about fireworks?"
limit_break: "I've still got lots more exciting new ideas!"
